mapper.select: SELECT PID , LOG_ID , LEAV_WORD_TIME , ANI , LEAVEWORD_PATH , VOICE_FILE_NAME , OUTPUT_FILEPATH , OUTPUT_FILENAME , ASR_STATUS , ASR_TIMESTAMP , ASR_FAILTIMES , DATAGENERATE_TIME , JSONPARSE_STATUS , JSONPARSE_RESULT , CALLID FROM ICC_UNION.T_QC_INTELLIGENT_ASR WHERE ROWNUM <= #{top} AND JSONPARSE_STATUS IS NULL AND OUTPUT_FILEPATH IS NOT NULL AND OUTPUT_FILENAME IS NOT NULL ORDER BY TO_date(LEAV_WORD_TIME,'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS')
